How do I investigate?', item_type='story', url=None, parent=None, text='3:40pm every day my wifi loses internet access. My devices remain connected to the network, but all traffic dies. Almost exactly 1 minute later everything is resumed. I have no idea what the cause could be.<p>How could I begin investigating this? I have a spare Raspberry Pi and and old Android phone at my disposal, and some programming competency.')
